name: minimization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of reducing something to the lowest possible level or amount: We decided to abandon all these schemes for tax minimization. the concepts of pollution prevention and waste minimization
the action of making something seem less important or smaller than it really is: There is a tendency towards a minimization of the negative impact of sexual harassment.
More examplesFewer examplesOur objective is minimization of the risk of error.We first performed a cost minimization exercise.This emotional abuse resulted from parents' minimization of their children's experiences.
